name: Location
description: This LWM2M Objects provide a range of device related information which can be queried by the LWM2M Server, and a device reboot and factory reset function.

0.name: Latitude
0.description: The decimal notation of latitude, e.g. -43.5723 [World Geodetic System 1984].

1.name: Longitude
1.description: The decimal notation of longitude, e.g. 153.21760 [World Geodetic System 1984].

2.name: Altitude
2.description: The decimal notation of altitude in meters above sea level.

3.name: Uncertainty
3.description: The accuracy of the position in meters.

4.name: Velocity
4.description: The velocity of the device as defined in 3GPP 23.032 GAD specification. This set of values may not be available if the device is static.

5.name: Timestamp
5.description: The timestamp of when the location measurement was performed.
